title: Forecasting: Add commit & best-case scenario buckets to forecast model and UI

sections.text: Implement support for separate Commit and Best-Case forecast scenarios in the forecasting pipeline, including storage/schema changes and aggregation logic. Update the forecast API and UI to return and display both scenario totals alongside the existing baseline forecast. Ensure scenario assignment is sourced from CRM stage/forecast category (or a clear default mapping) and is consistent across accounts/opportunities.
